languages.text: "Мы состязались в коварстве и ярости пять дней и ночей, дух менял обличья, но в итоге я вышиб ему глаз. Удирая, он прошипел проклятье — нигде, пообещал он, не найти мне доблестной смерти. Сага моя оборвется бесславно, как добрая ткань стяга, сгнившего на конце. Когда я вернулся на Клык, сжимая его раздавленный глаз, рунный жрец осмотрел меня и помрачнел, но не промолвил ни слова, лишь подтвердил мою победу".

"For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."
languages.original_text: "Мы состязались в коварстве и ярости пять дней и ночей, дух менял обличья, но в итоге я вышиб ему глаз. Удирая, он прошипел проклятье — нигде, пообещал он, не найти мне доблестной смерти. Сага моя оборвется бесславно, как добрая ткань стяга, сгнившего на конце. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

languages.text: “我们大战了五天五夜，将我们全部的智慧与怒火倾泻在战场上。它不停地改变着它的伪装，但到了最后，我还是挖出了它的眼睛。它一边逃跑，一边嘶声诅咒我，说它发下了重誓，诅咒我将永远无法在荣光中赴死。于是，我的史诗就这样戛然而止，不光彩地结束了，仿佛一面高贵旗帜的边缘发了霉，旗杆也折断了。当我握着那只被我碾碎的眼睛回到狼牙圣殿时，符文牧师看着我，脸色变得阴沉，但他一句话都没有说，仅仅是确认我获得了胜利。”
languages.original_text: "For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

traits.locale_text: “我们大战了五天五夜，将我们全部的智慧与怒火倾泻在战场上。它不停地改变着它的伪装，但到了最后，我还是挖出了它的眼睛。它一边逃跑，一边嘶声诅咒我，说它发下了重誓，诅咒我将永远无法在荣光中赴死。于是，我的史诗就这样戛然而止，不光彩地结束了，仿佛一面高贵旗帜的边缘发了霉，旗杆也折断了。当我握着那只被我碾碎的眼睛回到狼牙圣殿时，符文牧师看着我，脸色变得阴沉，但他一句话都没有说，仅仅是确认我获得了胜利。”

languages.text: «Durante cinco días con sus correspondientes noches nos enfrentamos, con todo nuestro ingenio y nuestra furia. El espíritu cambió de aspecto una y otra vez, pero terminé por sacarle los ojos. Mientras huía de mí, siseó una maldición: la criatura juró que no encontraré una muerte honorable. Mi saga llegará a un fin abrupto y carente de gloria, como un estandarte noble mohoso y raído. Cuando volví al Colmillo con el ojo estrujado de la criatura, el Sacerdote Rúnico me miró con rostro severo, pero sus únicas palabras fueron para confirmar mi victoria».
languages.original_text: "For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

Mi saga llegará a un fin abrupto y carente de gloria, como un estandarte noble mohoso y raído. Cuando volví al Colmillo con el ojo estrujado de la criatura, el Sacerdote Rúnico me miró con rostro severo, pero sus únicas palabras fueron para confirmar mi victoria».

languages.text: 「5日5晩、俺たちは知恵と怒りを戦いに費やした。精霊は姿を変えたが、ついに俺はその目をえぐり出した。逃げ惑う精霊は呪いの言葉を吐いた…いつかどこかで、俺は不名誉な死を迎えるのだと、その生物は呪ったのだ。俺のサーガは唐突に、そして不名誉な終わりを迎えるのだ。高貴な旗が朽ち果て、端から擦り切れていくように。砕けた眼球を握りしめながら<牙城>に戻ると、ルーンプリーストは俺を見て険しい表情を浮かべた。だが、俺の勝利を確かめる事以外、何も言葉を発しはしなかった」
languages.original_text: "For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

traits.locale_text: 「5日5晩、俺たちは知恵と怒りを戦いに費やした。精霊は姿を変えたが、ついに俺はその目をえぐり出した。逃げ惑う精霊は呪いの言葉を吐いた…いつかどこかで、俺は不名誉な死を迎えるのだと、その生物は呪ったのだ。俺のサーガは唐突に、そして不名誉な終わりを迎えるのだ。高貴な旗が朽ち果て、端から擦り切れていくように。砕けた眼球を握りしめながら<牙城>に戻ると、ルーンプリーストは俺を見て険しい表情を浮かべた。だが、俺の勝利を確かめる事以外、何も言葉を発しはしなかった」

languages.text: "Fünf Tage und Nächte lang haben wir mit Scharfsinn und Wut gekämpft. Der Geist änderte seine Gestalt, doch am Ende stach ich ihm die Augen aus. Als er floh, zischte er einen Fluch — ich sollte nirgendwo je einen ehrenhaften Tod finden, schwor das Geschöpf. Meine Saga kam zu einem abrupten und ruhmlosen Ende, wie ein nobles Banner, das vermodert und an den Rändern ausfranst. Als ich in den Reißzahn zurückkehrte, mit dem zerstochenen Auge in der Hand, blickte der Runenpriester mich an und sein Gesicht verdüsterte sich. Er sagte jedoch kein Wort, er bestätigte nur meinen Sieg."
languages.original_text: "For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

Er sagte jedoch kein Wort, er bestätigte nur meinen Sieg."

languages.text: « Pendant cinq jours et cinq nuits, nous nous sommes livré un combat sans merci. L'esprit a changé de forme, mais j'ai finalement pris ses yeux. En fuyant, il a sifflé une malédiction. La créature m'a condamné à ne trouver nulle part de mort honorable. Ma saga connut une fin abrupte et honteuse, à la manière d'une noble bannière qui finit par moisir et s'effilocher. Lorsque mes pas m'ont ramené au Croc, l'œil serré dans ma main, le prêtre des runes m'a regardé, et son visage s'est fait grave, mais il n'a pas dit un mot, si ce n'est pour confirmer ma victoire. »
languages.original_text: "For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

languages.text: "Savaşa dayanabilmek için beş gün beş gece aklımızı ve öfkemizi kullandık. Ruh, kılık değiştirse de sonunda onun gözlerini oymayı başardım. Kaçarken bana lanet okudu. Yaratık, beni asla onurlu bir ölüm tadamamam için lanetledi. Destanım, uçurumun kenarında çürüyüp parçalanan soylu bir sancak gibi ani ve alçak bir şekilde son buldu. Elimde ezdiğim gözle birlikte Diş'e döndüğümde Rün Rahibi bana baktı, yüzü ekşidi ama hiçbir şey söylemedi... Zaferimi bile doğrulamadı."
languages.original_text: "For five days and nights did we bring our wits and wrath to bear in battle. The spirit changed its guise, but in the end I gouged out its eyes. Fleeing, it hissed a curse — nowhere would I find an honourable death, vowed the creature. My saga came to an abrupt and inglorious end, like a noble banner mouldering and fraying at the edge. When I made my return to the Fang, clutching that crushed eye, the Rune Priest looked at me and his face grew grim, but he said not a word, save to confirm my victory."

traits.locale_text: "Savaşa dayanabilmek için beş gün beş gece aklımızı ve öfkemizi kullandık. Ruh, kılık değiştirdi ama sonunda onun gözlerini oymayı başardım. Kaçarken bana lanet okudu. Yaratık, beni asla onurlu şekilde ölememem için lanetledi. Destanım, uçurumun kenarında çürüyüp parçalanan soylu bir sancak gibi ani ve alçak bir şekilde son buldu. Elimde ezdiğim gözle birlikte Diş'e döndüğümde Rün Rahibi bana baktı, yüzü ekşidi ama hiçbir şey söylemedi, zaferimi bile doğrulamadı."
